MIA?
A couple of members have not been heard from in awhile...At least not by me! If you have any information on Bloodyknight or Unacis please let me know. They may be Alternates of someone's that just isn't played much. If that is the case, contact me and I will adjust the website to reflect that. If there is no information on these characters in th next two weeks they will be removed from the members list.

9/1/01
New Frontier Discovered!
A path through the Warrens has led to a totally new area to explore. At last the Stonebrunt Montain range is available to adventure in. This vast area is full of new creatures and riches...just be careful! Wamphyre was able to grab a shot of this giant cat right after it clawed poor Khaba to death!
By Kamdar Entil'Zha
Khaba Killed by Giant Cougar!

Update: 9/3.01
Just saw Unacis on last night. Does not appear to play as this characcter much. Tried to engage in conversation but he did not seem all that interested in talking with me, or in visiting the website.

New Polling Feature!
Click on the link below and try out the new polling feature now available on this site. Each one of these polls comes with multiple vote prevention, which means that I can set it up so that you can vote from a single computer once a day, once a week, once a month, or even once a year! Right now it is set so that you can vote once a day, so if there are multiple users on the same computer you will either have to find another computer to vote from, or wait a day to vote again. This is obviously to discourage the same user from having multiple votes. I already put in the first vote, and as you can tell by clicking on the "view" button for the results, I have not been having a very good time in Norrath lately! Please give the poll a try so I can determine if any kinks need to be worked out!
By Kamdar Entil'Zha
Click here to enter the poll!
9/5/01
Giddyup!
Sony has just announced that their upcoming EQ expansion "Shadows of Luclin" will feature mountable horses! What follows is the official press release. I don't know how much a horse will cost, but I would start saving my plat today!
By Kamdar Entil'Zha
9/9/01
With the addition of all new player models, numerous additional monsters, and an enhanced game engine, EverQuest: The Shadows of Luclin offers EverQuest subscribers an incredible amount of benefits with no additional monthly fee. Set against sweeping moonscapes, Luclin provides a new look and feel for EverQuest players and an entirely new world to be explored. Players can begin anew on Luclin or find their way to Norrath's moon on their own. How ever players get there, a new adventure awaits.

"We are committed to expanding the world of Norrath, creating new adventures and unexplored territories for EverQuest fans around the world," said Jeff Butler, Producer, Sony Online Entertainment. "We've always prided ourselves on giving great value with all of our expansions packs but Luclin goes even further than previous installments. This is going to be an incredible journey for all EverQuest fans."
Sony Online Entertainment, a worldwide leader in multiplayer online gaming announced today that mounted horses will be added into the world of Norrath when EverQuest: The Shadows of Luclin ships to retailers worldwide this December. Players will be able to purchase a horse of their own in designated locations and will be able to summon their horse with the aid of a magical whistle. Players will be able to traverse greater distances in shorter periods of time and even battle from their mounts.
EverQuest: The Shadows of Luclin ships this December.
Click here to see more screen shots
A Day of Remembrance...
In memory of all those who have perished, the passengers and pilots on the United and American Airlines flights, the workers in the World Trade Center and the Pentagon, all the innocent bystanders and the brave firefighters and policemen that were sent in to save them. Our hearts, hopes and prayers go out to the families and friends of the dead and missing.
